objectsAndArrays.joinArraysDesc: or join arrays in simple way:

singularPlural.multiplePluralsDesc: Use key_index if language has more than 1 plural form:
singularPlural.intervalPluralDesc:
Install i18next-intervalplural-postprocessor, if you need to define ranges like:
(2-7) - a few items
(7-inf) - a lot of items

context.useContextOptionDesc: Use t('key', {context}) with key_context to do something like this:
